message.text: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

steps.name: 1. Create ssh keys
steps.run:
ssh-keygen -m PEM -t rsa -b 4096 -f "$HOME/.ssh/id_rsa" -N ""
EXAMPLE_SSH_PRIVATE_KEY=$(cat $HOME/.ssh/id_rsa)
echo "EXAMPLE_SSH_PRIVATE_KEY=$EXAMPLE_SSH_PRIVATE_KEY<<EOF" >> $GITHUB_ENV
ssh-add "$HOME/.ssh/id_rsa"
ssh-add -l

steps.name: Build Host Server Image
steps.run:
docker build \
  -t ssh-host-image . \
  --build-arg ssh_pub_key="$(cat $HOME/.ssh/id_rsa.pub)" \
  --build-arg ssh_user=$TEST_USER \

steps.name: Start Host Server Container
steps.run: docker run --name ssh-host-container -d ssh-host-image

steps.name: Get IP of Host Server
steps.run:
docker inspect -f '{{range .NetworkSettings.Networks}}{{.IPAddress}}{{end}}' ssh-host-container > ip.txt
cat ip.txt
EXAMPLE_REMOTE_HOST=$(cat ip.txt)
echo "EXAMPLE_REMOTE_HOST=$EXAMPLE_REMOTE_HOST" >> $GITHUB_ENV

steps.name: Create project file
steps.run:
mkdir $TEST_PROJECT && cd $TEST_PROJECT
touch index.html
date +"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S,%3N" >> index.html
cat index.html

ssh-keygen -m PEM -t rsa -b 4096 -f "$HOME/.ssh/id_rsa" -N ""

echo "EOF" >> $GITHUB_ENV

steps.name: Build Host Server Image

  -t ssh-host-image . \
  --build-arg SSH_PUB_KEY="$(cat $HOME/.ssh/id_rsa.pub)" \
  --build-arg ssh_user="${{ env.TEST_USER }}"
docker run -d -p 8822:22 --name=ssh-host-container ssh-host-image
docker exec ssh-host-container sh -c "hostname --ip-address" > ip.txt
echo "REMOTE_HOST<<EOF" >> $GITHUB_ENV
cat ip.txt >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "EOF" >> $GITHUB_ENV

steps.name: Create project file
steps.run:
mkdir test_project && cd "$_"

date +"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S,%3N" >> index.html
truncate -s 50MB image.svg

truncate -s 5MB text_in_skip_dir.txt

truncate -s 5MB info2.txt
cd ../
mkdir test_project && cd "$_"
touch index.html
date +"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S,%3N" >> index.html
truncate -s 50MB image.svg
truncate -s 5MB info.txt
truncate -s 500MB big_file.txt
mkdir skip_dir && cd "$_"
truncate -s 5MB text_in_skip_dir.txt
cd ../
cat index.html
echo "test_project:" && ls -lR
echo "skip_dir:" && ls -lR skip_dir

message.text: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}
Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

steps.name: E2E Test Specific - Clean up old test files
steps.run: docker stop ssh-host-container || true && docker rm ssh-host-container || true

steps.name: E2E Test Specific - Create ssh keys
steps.run:
echo $HOME
ls -la $HOME
ssh-keygen -m PEM -t rsa -b 4096 -f "$HOME/.ssh/id_rsa" -N ""
eval `ssh-agent -s`
ssh-add "$HOME/.ssh/id_rsa"
ssh-add -l
echo "SSH_PRIVATE_KEY<<EOF" >> $GITHUB_ENV
cat $HOME/.ssh/id_rsa >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "EOF" >> $GITHUB_ENV

steps.name: E2E Test Specific - Build Host Server Image
steps.run:
docker build \
  -t ssh-host-image . \
  --build-arg SSH_PUB_KEY="$(cat $HOME/.ssh/id_rsa.pub)"
docker run -d -p 8822:22 --name=ssh-host-container ssh-host-image
docker exec ssh-host-container sh -c "hostname --ip-address" > ip.txt
echo "REMOTE_HOST<<EOF" >> $GITHUB_ENV
cat ip.txt >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "EOF" >> $GITHUB_ENV

steps.name: E2E Test Specific - Create project file
steps.run:
mkdir test_project2 && cd "$_"
truncate -s 5MB info2.txt
cd ../
mkdir test_project && cd "$_"
touch index.html
date +"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S,%3N" >> index.html
truncate -s 50MB image.svg
truncate -s 5MB info.txt
truncate -s 500MB big_file.txt
mkdir skip_dir && cd "$_"
truncate -s 5MB text_in_skip_dir.txt
cd ../
cat index.html
echo "test_project:" && ls -lR
echo "skip_dir:" && ls -lR skip_dir

steps.name: set shared ENV variables for multi target deployment
steps.run:
echo "ARGS=-rlgoDzvcR -i --delete --chmod=ugo+rwX --progress" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "SSH_CMD_ARGS=-o StrictHostKeyChecking=no, -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "SOURCE=test_project/ test_project2/" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "EXCLUDE=skip_dir/, /node_modules/" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "SCRIPT_BEFORE<<EOF" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "whoami" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "ls -lR /var/www/html/" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "EOF" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "SCRIPT_AFTER<<EOF" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo $RSYNC_STDOUT >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "ls -lR /var/www/html/" >> $GITHUB_ENV
echo "EOF" >> $GITHUB_ENV
